data.Josef Pechal:
Josef is a stable chorus actor who enjoys writing

Josef Pechal is a 22-year-old chorus actor who enjoys writing, adult colouring books and eating out. He is stable and creative, but can also be very cowardly and a bit moody.

He is a Czech Christian. He didn't finish school.

Physically, Josef is in good shape. He is tall with light skin, brown hair and green eyes.

He grew up in a middle class neighbourhood. After his father died when he was young, he was raised by his mother.

He is currently single. His most recent romance was with a cleaner called Nadine Tyrell Patel, who was the same age as him. They broke up because Nadine wanted to be with somebody less conventional.

Josef's best friend is a chorus actor called Nicole O'Doherty. They get on well most of the time. He also hangs around with Edmund Gray and Aya King. They enjoy planking together.

physical_characteristics.Hairstyle: short-medium sides with a long, floppy fringe
physical_characteristics.Other words that might be used: full-length, grandiloquent, leggy, long-legged, slim, stately, statuesque, tall

personality.Hobbies: writing, adult colouring books, eating out, planking, ferret racing, photography, worship

background.Early years: Josef grew up in a middle class neighbourhood. After his father died when he was young, he was raised by his mother
background.Formative years: Josef got is first job as a extra at age 16. Josef dropped out of school.

nicole_marilyn_o’doherty.Relationship: They get on well most of the time

aya_emmy_king.Relationship: They get on well most of the time

alison_libby_reyes.Relationship: Josef and Alison grew up together. They get on well most of the time.

flynn_aliza_pechal.Relationship: They get on well most of the time.

nadine_tyrell_patel.Reason for breakup: Nadine wanted to be with somebody less conventional

timeline.1999: Father, Rafael Marion Pechal dies aged 22 (cancer)
timeline.2013: Gets together with Billy Irene Bennett. Starts work at 20th Century Snake at extra
timeline.2015: Relationship with Billy Irene Bennett ends (Billy wanted somebody less dastardly).
timeline.2016: Gets together with Nadine Tyrell Patel.
timeline.2017: Resigns from job as extra at 20th Century Snake Starts work at The Minsqueak Theatre at chorus actor
timeline.2018: Relationship with Nadine Tyrell Patel ends (Nadine wanted to be with somebody less conventional).
